# Code of Conduct

This project follows the rOpenSci Code of Conduct.

All contributors, maintainers, and users of this project are expected to
adhere to the rOpenSci Code of Conduct to ensure a welcoming and inclusive
environment.

For more information, please see:
https://ropensci.org/code-of-conduct/

Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be
reported to the rOpenSci team via the reporting guidelines described at the
link above.
